pullRequest.title: #3098 initial build of presentation server
pullRequest.bodyText:
Signed-off-by: Nigel Jones nigel.l.jones+git@gmail.com
See #3098 which has a more complete 'todo' list for changes in this area
This is an initial build for a new maven module  org.odpi.egeria:presentation-server
npm: 6.14.5 (current LTS)
node: 12.16.0 (12.18.0 is LTS, but breaks with babel)
Node is downloaded and run only from within nodejs/node - it does NOT use system version to maintain consistency
Currently a jar is produced with 3 files:
www/favicon.ico
www/index.html
www/bundle.js
as produced by webpack
The plan for this PR is to perform one kind of build, and to create a deployable artifact (which I will test) - another commit will use the files generated above and include in an assembly.
Expect more refactoring in later PRs.

commit.message:
#3098 initial build of presentation server

Signed-off-by: Nigel Jones <nigel.l.jones+git@gmail.com>

#3098 add presentation server assembly and docker image

Signed-off-by: Nigel Jones <nigel.l.jones+git@gmail.com>

#3098 bug fixes for docker build

Signed-off-by: Nigel Jones <nigel.l.jones+git@gmail.com>

#3098 build presentation server as part of main docker images

Signed-off-by: Nigel Jones <nigel.l.jones+git@gmail.com>
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.t pushcom/odpi/egeria into issue3098

#3098 add node tools directory to gitignore

Signed-off-by: Nigel Jones <nigel.l.jones+git@gmail.com>

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,172 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+
+<!-- SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 -->
+<!-- Copyright Contributors to the ODPi Egeria project. -->
+
+<!-- TODO: This is a first pass definition for a new component in development -->
+
+<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
+         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
+         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
+
+    <parent>
+        <artifactId>user-interfaces</artifactId>
+        <groupId>org.odpi.egeria</groupId>
+        <version>2.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
+    </parent>
+
+    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+
+    <scm>
+        <connection>scm:git:git://github.com/odpi/egeria.git</connection>
+        <developerConnection>scm:git:ssh://github.com/odpi/egeria.git</developerConnection>
+        <url>http://github.com/odpi/egeria/tree/master</url>
+    </scm>
+
+    <name>Egeria Presentation Server</name>
+    <description>
+        Provides the Egeria Presentation Server.
+    </description>
+
+    <artifactId>presentation-server</artifactId>
+    <packaging>jar</packaging>
+
+    <!-- TODO: Move to top level if we can have consistency node/npm with other node components-->
+    <properties>
+        <node.version>v12.16.0</node.version>
+        <npm.version>6.14.5</npm.version>
+        <node.downloadRoot>https://nodejs.org/dist/</node.downloadRoot>
+        <npm.downloadRoot>https://registry.npmjs.org/npm/-/</npm.downloadRoot>
+    </properties>
+
+    <dependencies>
+
+    </dependencies>
+
+    <build>
+        <plugins>
+            <plugin>
+                <groupId>com.github.eirslett</groupId>
+                <artifactId>frontend-maven-plugin</artifactId>
+                <executions>
+                    <execution>
+                        <id>install node and npm</id>
+                        <goals>
+                            <goal>install-node-and-npm</goal>
+                        </goals>
+                        <configuration>
+                            <nodeVersion>${node.version}</nodeVersion>
+                            <npmVersion>${npm.version}</npmVersion>
+                            <workingDirectory>nodejs</workingDirectory>
+                            <nodeDownloadRoot>${node.downloadRoot}</nodeDownloadRoot>
+                            <npmDownloadRoot>${npm.downloadRoot}</npmDownloadRoot>
+                        </configuration>
+                    </execution>
+                    <execution>
+                        <id>npm-install</id>
+                        <goals>
+                            <goal>npm</goal>
+                        </goals>
+                        <configuration>
+                            <arguments>install --prefix .</arguments>
+                            <workingDirectory>nodejs</workingDirectory>
+                        </configuration>
+                    </execution>
+                    <execution>
+                        <id>webpack-build</id>
+                        <goals>
+                            <goal>webpack</goal>
+                        </goals>
+                        <configuration>
+                            <!-- TODO: This is dev mode with debugging - so not what we want for production -->
+                            <arguments>--mode development --devtool inline-source-map</arguments>
+                        </configuration>
+                    </execution>
+                </executions>
+                <configuration>
+                    <workingDirectory>nodejs</workingDirectory>
+                </configuration>
+            </plugin>
+
+            <!-- TODO: copy everything we want to keep into target -->
+            <!-- Combined with webpack it's probably useful the p.s. built composes most of the -->
+            <!-- required runtime tree - rather than lots of complex copies/moves in the assembly -->
+            <!-- for now we'll do this in assembly descriptor only -->
+            <!--plugin>
+                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
+                <artifactId>maven-resources-plugin</artifactId>
+                <executions>
+                    <execution>
+                        <id>copy-resources-from-node</id>
+                        <phase>prepare-package</phase>
+                        <goals>
+                            <goal>copy-resources</goal>
+                        </goals>
+                        <configuration>
+                            <overwrite>true</overwrite>
+                            <outputDirectory>${project.build.outputDirectory}/www</outputDirectory>
+                            <resources>
+                                <resource>
+                                    <directory>${basedir}/nodejs/dist</directory>
+                                    <filtering>false</filtering>
+                                </resource>
+                                <resource>
+                                    <directory>${basedir}/nodejs</directory>
+                                    <includes>
+                                        <include>package.json</include>
+                                    </includes>
+                                </resource>
+                            </resources>
+                        </configuration>
+                    </execution>
+                </executions>
+            </plugin-->
+
+
+            <!-- TODO: Ensure anything not cleaned up by node is cleaned out here -->
